ygData.subject: Re: [[EQ_Necromancer] pets and weapons ]
ygData.msgSnippet: There is no way to retrieve items from a pet once you giv it to them (on the non pvp server. pvp server you can kill and loot your pet ) your pet doesnt need
ygData.messageBody:
There is no way to retrieve items from a pet once you giv it to them
(on the non pvp server. pvp server you can kill and loot your pet )
your pet doesnt need weapons they will do more damage over a fight without a
weapon . Your pets damage "rating " is about 5 and speed is
about 28 so most rusty weapons will slow your pet down and do less damage.
Trinnes level 15 necromancer
